PSIONIC CLASSES

파워 포인트 비축

THE POWER POINT RESERVE

Psionic characters fuel their 능력 through a pool, or reserve, of 파워 포인트. Your power point reserve is equal to your base 파워 포인트 gained from your class, bonus 파워 포인트 from a high key ability score (see 능력치와 구현자, below), and any additional bonus 파워 포인트 from sources such as your character race and feat selections.

멀티직업 사이오닉 캐릭터
Multiclass Psionic Characters

If you have 레벨 in more than one psionic class, you combine your 파워 포인트 from each class to make up your reserve. You can use these 파워 포인트 to manifest powers from any psionic class you have.

While you maintain a single reserve of 파워 포인트 from your class, race, and feat selections, you are still limited by the 구현자 레벨 you have achieved with each power you know.

능력치와 구현자

ABILITIES AND MANIFESTERS

The ability that your powers depend on—your key ability score as a manifester—is related to what psionic class (or classes) you have 레벨 in: 지능 (사이언), 지혜 (사이킥 군인), and 매력 (와일더). The modifier for this ability is referred to as your key ability modifier. If your character’s key ability score is 9 or lower, you can’t manifest powers from that psionic class.

Just as a high 지능 score grants bonus 주문 to a 마법사 and a high 지혜 score grants bonus 주문 to a 사제, a character who manifests powers (사이언, 사이킥 군인, and 와일더) gains bonus 파워 포인트 according to his key ability score. Refer to Table: 능력 수정치 and Bonus 파워 포인트.

How To Determine Bonus 파워 포인트: Your key ability score grants you additional 파워 포인트 equal to your key ability modifier x your 구현자 레벨 x1/2. Table: 능력 수정치 and Bonus 파워 포인트 shows these calculations for class 레벨 1st through 20th and key 능력 점수 from 10 to 41.

사이언

PSION

성향: Any.

Hit Die: d4.

직업 스킬
Class Skills

The 사이언’s 직업 스킬 (and the key ability for each skill) are 집중* (Con), 제작 (Int), 지식 (all 스킬, taken individually)* (Int), 전문직 (Wis), and 사이크래프트* (Int). In addition, a 사이언 gains access to additional 직업 스킬 based on his 분야:

예언가 (초감각): 정보 수집 (Cha), 듣기 (Wis), and 감지 (Wis).

조형가 (재귀창조): 허세 (Cha), 변장 (Cha), and 사이오닉 장치 사용하기* (Cha).

염동력자 (염동력): 자기최면* (Wis), 장치 무력화 (Dex), and 위협 (Cha).

에고이스트 (정신적대사작용): 자기최면* (Wis), 균형 (Dex) and 치료 (Wis).

유목민 (시공간초월): 등반 (Str), 도약 (Str), 탑승 (Dex), 생존 (Wis), and 수영 (Str).

정신감응가 (정신감응): 허세 (Cha), 외교 (Cha), 정보 수집 (Cha), and 의도 파악 (Wis).

*New skill or expanded use of existing skill.

Skill Points at 1 레벨: (2 + Int modifier) x4.

Skill Points at Each Additional 레벨: 2 + Int modifier.

직업 특성
Class Features

All the following are 직업 특성 of the 사이언.

Weapon and 갑옷 숙련: 사이언 are proficient with the club, dagger, heavy crossbow, 빛 crossbow, quarterstaff, and shortspear. They are not proficient with any type of 갑옷 or 방패. 갑옷 does not, however, interfere with the manifestation of powers.

파워 포인트/Day: A 사이언’s ability to manifest powers is limited by the 파워 포인트 he has available. His base daily allotment of 파워 포인트 is given on Table: The 사이언. In addition, he receives bonus 파워 포인트 per day if he has a high 지능 score (see Table: 능력 수정치 and Bonus 파워 포인트). His race may also provide bonus 파워 포인트 per day, as may certain 특기 and items.

분야: Every 사이언 must decide at 1 레벨 which psionic 분야 he will specialize in. Choosing a 분야 provides a 사이언 with access to the 직업 스킬 associated with that 분야 (see above), as well as the powers restricted to that 분야. However, choosing a 분야 also means that the 사이언 cannot learn powers that are restricted to other 분야. He can’t even use such powers by employing 사이오닉 아이템.

Powers Known: A 사이언 begins play knowing three 사이언 powers of your choice. Each time he achieves a new 레벨, he unlocks the 지식 of new powers.

Choose the powers known from the 사이언 파워 목록, or from the list of powers of your chosen 분야. You cannot choose powers from 분야 other than your chosen 분야. (Exception: The 특기 지식의 확장 and 에픽 지식의 확장 do allow a 사이언 to learn powers from the lists of other 분야 or even other classes.) A 사이언 can manifest any power that has a power point cost equal to or lower than his 구현자 레벨.

The number of times a 사이언 can manifest powers in a day is limited only by his daily 파워 포인트.

A 사이언 simply knows his powers; they are ingrained in his mind. He does not need to prepare them (in the way that some spellcasters prepare their 주문), though he must get a good night’s 수면 each day to regain all his spent 파워 포인트.

The 난이도 등급 for 내성 굴림 against 사이언 powers is 10 + the power’s 레벨 + the 사이언’s 지능 modifier. Maximum Power 레벨 Known: A 사이언 begins play with the ability to learn 1st-레벨 powers. As he attains higher 레벨, a 사이언 may gain the ability to master more complex powers.

To learn or manifest a power, a 사이언 must have an 지능 score of at least 10 + the power’s 레벨.

Bonus 특기: A 사이언 gains a bonus feat at 1 레벨, 5th 레벨, 10 레벨, 15th 레벨, and 20th 레벨. This feat must be a psionic feat, a metapsionic feat, or a psionic item creation feat.

These bonus 특기 are in addition to the 특기 that a character of any class gains every three 레벨. A 사이언 is not limited to 사이오닉 특기, 메타사이오닉 특기, and 사이오닉 아이템 제작 특기 when choosing these other 특기.

PSIONIC 분야

A 분야 is one of six groupings of powers, each defined by a common theme. The six 분야 are 초감각, 재귀창조, 염동력, 정신적대사작용, 시공간초월, and 정신감응.

초감각: A 사이언 who chooses 초감각 is known as a 예언가. 예언가 can learn precognitive powers to 보조 their comrades in 전투, as well as powers that permit them to 정보 수집 in many different ways.

재귀창조: A 사이언 specializing in 재귀창조 is known as a 조형가. This 분야 includes powers that draw ectoplasm or matter from 영적 세계, creating semisolid and solid items such as 갑옷, 무기, or animated constructs to do battle at the 조형가’s 명령.

염동력: 사이언 who specialize in 염동력 are known as 염동력자. They are the masters of powers that manipulate and transform matter and energy. 염동력자 can 공격 with devastating blasts of energy.

정신적대사작용: A 사이언 who specializes in 정신적대사작용 is known as an 에고이스트. This 분야 consists of powers that alter the 사이언’s psychobiology, or that of creatures near him. An 에고이스트 can both 치료 and transform himself into a fearsome 전사.

시공간초월: A 사이언 who relies on 시공간초월 powers is known as a 유목민. 유목민 can wield powers that propel or displace objects in space or time.

정신감응: A 사이언 who chooses the 분야 of 정신감응 is known as a 정신감응가. He is the master of powers that allow mental contact and control of other sentient creatures. A 정신감응가 can deceive or destroy the minds of his enemies with ease.

정신결정

A 정신결정 is a fragment of a psionic character’s personality, brought into physical form and a semblance of life (via the 정신결정 친화력 feat). A 정신결정 appears as a crystalline construct about the size of a human hand.

Because it is an extension of its creator’s personality, a character’s 정신결정 is in some ways a part of him. That’s why, for example, a psionic character can manifest a personal 거리 power on his 정신결정 even though normally he can manifest such a power only on himself.

A 정신결정 is treated as a construct for the 목적 of all effects that depend on its type.

A 정신결정 grants 특수 능력 to its owner, as shown on the 정신결정 특수 능력 table below. In addition, a 정신결정 has a personality (being a fragment of the owner’s personality), which gives its owner a bonus on certain types of checks or 내성 굴림, as given on the 정신결정 Personalities table below. These 특수 능력 and bonuses apply only when the owner and the 정신결정 are within 1 mile of each other.

정신결정 능력 are based on the owner’s 레벨 in 사이오닉 직업. 레벨 from other classes do not count toward the owner’s 레벨 for 목적 of 정신결정 능력.

A 정신결정 can 말하기 one language of its owner’s choice (so long as it is a language the owner knows). A 정신결정 can understand all other languages known by its owner, but cannot 말하기 them. This is a supernatural ability.

정신결정 Basics: Use the statistics for a 정신결정, but make the following changes.

내성 굴림: A 정신결정 uses its owner’s base 내성 굴림 bonuses and 능력 수정치 on 내성 굴림, though it doesn’t enjoy any other bonuses its owner might have (from 마법 아이템 or 특기, for example).

능력: When its self-propulsion ability is not activated, a 정신결정 has no 근력 score and no 민첩 score.

스킬: A 정신결정 has the same skill ranks as its owner, except that it has a minimum of 4 ranks each in 감지, 듣기, 조용히 이동, and 탐색. (Even if its owner has no ranks in these 스킬, a 정신결정 has 4 ranks in each.) A 정신결정 uses its own 능력 수정치 on 스킬 판정.

정신결정 Ability 묘사: All 정신결정 have 특수 능력 (or impart 능력 to their owners) depending on the 레벨 of the owner, as shown on the table above. 능력 on the table are cumulative.

Natural 갑옷 Adj. (Ex): This number noted here is an improvement to the 정신결정’s natural 갑옷 bonus (normally 0). It represents a 정신결정’s preternatural durability.

지능 Adj. (Ex): Add this value to the 정신결정’s 지능 score. 정신결정 are as smart as people (though not necessarily as smart as smart people).

경계 (Ex): The presence of a 정신결정 sharpens its master’s senses. While a 정신결정 is within arm’s reach (adjacent to or in the same square as its owner), its owner gains the 경계 feat.

Improved Evasion (Ex): If a 정신결정 is subjected to an 공격 that normally allows a Reflex 내성 굴림 for half 피해, it takes no 피해 if it makes a successful 내성 굴림 and half 피해 even if the 내성 굴림 fails.

Personality (Ex): Every 정신결정 has a personality. See 정신결정 Personality, below.

Self-Propulsion (Su): As a standard action, its owner can will a 정신결정 to form spidery, ectoplasmic legs that grant the 정신결정 a land 속도 of 30 feet and a 등반 속도 of 20 feet. The legs fade into nothingness after one day (or sooner, if the owner desires).

Share Powers (Su): At the owner’s option, he can have any power (but not any psi-like ability) he manifests on himself also affect his 정신결정. The 정신결정 must be within 5 feet of him at the time of the manifestation to receive the benefit. If the power has a 지속시간 other than instantaneous, it stops affecting the 정신결정 if it 이동 farther than 5 feet away, and will not affect the 정신결정 again, even if it returns to its owner before the 지속시간 expires.

Additionally, the owner can manifest a power with a target of “You” on his 정신결정 (as a touch 거리 power) instead of on himself. The owner and 정신결정 cannot share powers if the powers normally do not affect creatures of the 정신결정’s type (construct).

Sighted (Ex): Although it has no physical sensory organs, a 정신결정 can telepathically sense its 환경 as well as a creature with normal 시야 and hearing. 암흑 (even supernatural 암흑) is irrelevant, as are 범위 of supernatural 침묵, though a 정신결정 still can’t discern invisible or ethereal beings. A 정신결정’s sighted 거리 is 40 feet.

Telepathic Link (Su): The owner has a telepathic link with his 정신결정 out to a distance of up to 1 mile. The owner cannot see through the 정신결정’s senses, but the two of them can communicate telepathically as if the 정신결정 were the target of a 정신연결 power manifested by the owner. For instance, a 정신결정 placed in a distant room could relay the activities occurring in that room.

Because of the telepathic link between a 정신결정 and its owner, the owner has the same connection to an item or place that the 정신결정 does. For instance, if his 정신결정 has seen a room, the owner can 순간이동 into that room as if he has seen it too.

Deliver Touch Powers (Su): If the owner is 3rd 레벨 or higher, his 정신결정 can deliver touch powers for him. If the owner and 정신결정 are in contact at the time the owner manifests a touch power, he can designate his 정신결정 as the “toucher.” The 정신결정 can then deliver the touch power just as the owner could. As usual, if the owner manifests another power before the touch is delivered, the touch power dissipates.

Telepathic Speech (Ex): If the owner is 5th 레벨 or higher, the 정신결정 can communicate telepathically with any creature that has a language and is within 30 feet of the 정신결정, while the 정신결정 is also within 1 mile of the owner.

Flight (Su): If the owner is 9th 레벨 or higher, he can, as a standard action, will his 정신결정 to 비행 at a 속도 of 50 feet (poor). The 정신결정 drifts gently to the ground after one day (or sooner, if the owner desires).

파워 저항 (Ex): If the owner is 11th 레벨 or higher, the 정신결정 gains 파워 저항 equal to the owner’s 레벨 + 5. To affect the 정신결정 with a power, another manifester must get a result on a 구현자 레벨 check that equals or exceeds the 정신결정’s 파워 저항.

Sight Link (Sp): If the owner is 13 레벨 이상, the character can remote view the 정신결정 (as if manifesting the remote view power) once per day.

Channel Power (Sp): If the owner is 15th 레벨 or higher, he can manifest powers through the 정신결정 to a distance of up to 1 mile. The 정신결정 is treated as the power’s originator, and all 거리 are calculated from its location.

When channeling a power through his 정신결정, the owner manifests the power by paying its power point cost. He is still subject to 기회 공격 and other hazards of manifesting a power, if applicable (for instance, he becomes visible when manifesting an offensive power if invisible, as does the 정신결정).

정신결정 Personality (Ex): Each 정신결정 has a distinct personality, chosen by its owner at the time of its creation from among those given on the following table. At 1 레벨, its owner typically gets a feel for a 정신결정’s personality only through occasional impulses, but as the owner increases in 레벨 the 정신결정’s personality becomes more pronounced. At higher 레벨, it is not uncommon for a 정신결정 to constantly ply its owner with observations and advice, often severely slanted toward the 정신결정’s particular worldview. The owner always sees a bit of himself in his 정신결정, even if magnified and therefore distorted.
